summary.span: 用來將 物件來回轉換為其他的物件型別。

span.span: Used to convert a object to or from another object type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個類別來將字串轉換成或。Use this class to convert a string into a or an . 請參閱這些型別的語法資訊的頁面。See these type pages for syntax information. 此類別通常用於剖析器將屬性的字串轉換成筆刷。This class is typically used by the parser to convert attribute strings to brushes.
